articles.title: G2-class solar storm HAMMERS the Earth; Blackouts to haunt Arctic Circle entire week - HT Tech
articles.description: The solar storm that struck the Earth yesterday, March 16, was found to peak at G2-class. Due to intense solar storm activity, the Arctic region is expected to experience radio blackouts for the rest of the week.

articles.title: Next-generation spacesuit for future NASA mission to Moon unveiled - HT Tech
articles.description: The suit revealed at an event at the Johnson Space Center in Houston features greater flexibility and thermal protection than those worn by the Apollo astronauts who first walked on the lunar surface more than 50 years ago.
articles.content:
NASA and the private aerospace company Axiom Space unveiled a prototype on Wednesday of the next-generation spacesuit that astronauts will wear on the next mission to the Moon.
